summary: Candidate files and folders flagged for cleanup. Review before executing scripts/cleanup.sh or scripts/clean.js

items.reason: Duplicate HTTP server: webhook and payments endpoints are handled in functions/src/index.ts. Only referenced by Dockerfile; safe to remove if Docker deployment not required.
Container startup image used to run api/handlepaymentwebhook.js; repo now uses Firebase Functions. Remove if not using custom Cloud Run or Docker deployment.
Compiled TypeScript output. These are build artifacts and should be regenerated from src. Keep src and tsconfig; delete lib and add to .gitignore if desired.
Expo web cache directory (derived). Safe to delete to reclaim space.
iOS derived build artifacts. Safe to delete (recreated by Xcode/EAS).
Android Gradle build artifacts. Safe to delete (recreated by Gradle/EAS).
Local cache (Metro/Babel/etc.). Safe to delete; dependencies remain in node_modules.
Folder contains a standalone webhook server duplicate of Cloud Functions code. Move or remove if you rely on Firebase functions instead of Docker/Cloud Run.
